home_page.subtitle: As an open cross-chain bridge protocol based on Substrate, Darwinia focuses on the construction of future Internet of Tokens, including decentralized tokens swap, exchange and market
home_page.subscribe_tip: Subscription success! Please check your inbox.
home_page.theme_desc: As an open cross-chain bridge protocol based on Substrate, Darwinia focuses on the construction of future Internet of Tokens, including decentralized tokens swap, exchange and market
home_page.highlight_block_content_2: The Parachain of Polkadot focused on cross-chain token trading
home_page.highlight_block_content_3: The technology that provides support for cross-chain
home_page.economic_block_content_1: The native tokens for Darwinia Network is RING, RING can be used as gas for transactions. Gas include transaction fees, contract execution fees, network bandwidth charges, storage fees, and more.
home_page.economic_block_content_2: To encourage users to make long term commitments and pledge, users can choose to lock RING for 3 - 36 months in the process of Staking, and the system will offer a KTON token as reward for users participating in Staking.
home_page.economic_block_content_3: The Darwinia Network will distribute RING as an incentive to the participants of Staking. The process of Staking can also be understood as the POS mining process, where the miner obtains Staking energy by pledging tokens for POS mining.
home_page.application_block_content_1: Token DEX is a decentralized application based on the Darwinia cross-chain bridge as the core technology, which can realize automatic cross-chain transactions between tokens
home_page.application_block_content_2: The decentralized nft auction market, which supports nft auctions of different blockchain networks through cross-chain auctions, creates a new NFT cross-chain circulation scenario
home_page.dev_content: Do you want to get involved?
home_page.news_title_1: Darwinia sharing on Polkadot China row
home_page.news_title_2: How to buy/sell RING on uniswap?
home_page.news_title_3: Darwinia Network released its first test network, codenamed "Trilobita"

faq_page.title: FAQs
faq_page.faq_1_title: 1. What can we do in the "Genesis Generation" stage?
faq_page.faq_1_content_1: RINGs and KTONs on Ethereum and TRON can be cross-chain transferred to Darwinia Mainnet.
faq_page.faq_1_content_2: CRINGs of Darwinia Crab can be swapped to RINGs of mainnet at a ratio of 100 to 1.
faq_page.faq_2_title: 2. Should I participate in the "Genesis Generation"? What are the pros and cons?
faq_page.faq_2_content_1: Users must seriously think about their needs.
faq_page.faq_2_content_2: Pros: Users can participate in staking as soon as possible to get rewards.
faq_page.faq_2_content_3: Cons: Users' coins will lose liquidity for a while. May be until mid-November.  TRON and Crab's cross-chain bridge has no plans yet, and it will take longer to lose liquidity.
faq_page.faq_3_title: 3. Is there a deadline for "Genesis Generation"?
faq_page.faq_3_content: Yes. The deadline for "Genesis Generation" is 2020-09-24 8:00 UTC or 2020-09-24 16:00 Beijing.
faq_page.faq_4_content: Only the transaction fee of the source network
faq_page.faq_5_title: 5. When will the Ethereum-Darwinia mainnet cross-chain bridge open?
faq_page.faq_5_content_1: In the second stage of the launch (approximately 1 month after the end of the "Genesis Generation"), the Ethereum-Darwinia one-way bridge will be opened first, through which RINGs and KTONs on Ethereum can be transferred to the Darwinia mainnet network.
faq_page.faq_5_content_2: In the third stage of the launch (approximately 0.5 or 1 month after the second stage), the Ethereum-Darwinia bidirectional bridge will be opened, and RINGs/KTONs can be freely transferred between these two networks.
faq_page.faq_6_title: 6. When will the TRON-Darwinia cross-chain bridge open?
faq_page.faq_6_content: Currently, the cross-chain transfer of RINGs and KTONs on the TRON to Darwinia mainnet can only be done during the "Genesis Generation". The TRON-Darwinia cross-chain bridge will be implemented in the fourth stage.
faq_page.faq_7_title: 7. When will the Crab-Mainnet cross-chain bridge open?
faq_page.faq_7_content: Currently, the cross-chain swapping of CRINGs to RINGs can only be done during the "Genesis Generation". The cross-chain bridge of Crab-Mainnet will be implemented in the fourth stage.
faq_page.faq_8_title: 8. When will RINGs and KTONs on Darwinia mainnet be transferred to Ethereum?
faq_page.faq_8_content: After the third phase of the mainnet launch, users can transfer their RINGs and KTONs between Darwinia mainnet and Ethereum through the Ethereum-Darwinia two-way cross-chain bridge.
faq_page.faq_9_title: 9. How to participate in Mainnet Staking?
faq_page.faq_9_content_1: Before the second stage, only those users who are now participating in the "Genesis Generation" can participate in staking when the first stage of the mainnet is opened.
faq_page.faq_9_content_2: Other users need to wait until the second stage opens before they can transfer their RINGs or KTONs to mainnet to participate in staking.
faq_page.faq_10_title: 10. How to deposit RINGs to get KTONs?
faq_page.faq_10_content_1: Currently, you can deposit RINGs to KTONs in the v1 version of Gringotts in Ethereum and TRON, but this function will be disabled when the "Genesis Generation" stage ends.
faq_page.faq_10_content_2: This function can only be performed on the mainnet in the future. Users can get additional KTONs rewards by locking their RINGs 1~36 months.
faq_page.faq_11_title: 11. When can I transfer on Darwinia mainnet?
faq_page.faq_11_content: After the third stage of the mainnet is opened, users can transfer their RINGs and KTONs on the mainnet.
faq_page.faq_12_title: 12. Can I genesis cross-chain transfer KTONs only?
faq_page.faq_12_content: No. Because when you are participating in staking on the mainnet, a small number of RINGs is required as a gas, so you must transfer some RINGs as gas to the mainnet. It is recommended to have at least 1 RING, which can be 100 CRING mapping to RING, or transfer 1 RING to the main network.
faq_page.faq_13_title: 13. The deposit receipt can be transferred to the mainnet now?
faq_page.faq_13_content: No. It can be transferred to the mainnet only after the second stage opened.
faq_page.faq_14_title: 14. How to get your Darwinia mainnet address?
faq_page.faq_15_title: 15. Can the genesis swapping or transferring be executed multiple times?
faq_page.faq_15_content: Yes. As long as there is a balance that can be used.
faq_page.faq_16_title: 16. What are the parameters of the mainnet?
faq_page.faq_16_content_4: Unbonding duration (the days to wait after unbond): 14 days
faq_page.faq_16_content_8: The annual inflation rate is around 5%
faq_page.faq_16_content_9: Inflation allocation: 50% to Validators, 50% to Treasury
faq_page.faq_16_content_10: Transaction fee allocation: 20% to Validator, 80% to Treasury
faq_page.faq_16_content_11: Note: When mainnet is finally launched, some parameters may be adjusted according to the actual
faq_page.faq_17_title: 17. How long will it take for the results to come out after participating in the validator election?
faq_page.faq_17_content: When getting into the next era, that is up to 24 hours.

brand.title: Darwinia Brand
brand.desc: This page displays the LOGO, icons and other design files of Darwinia Network and Darwinia Crab Network tokens (included: RING, KTON, cRING, cKTON, etc.)
brand.about_desc: Darwinia Network is a decentralized heterogeneous cross-chain bridge protocol developed using Substrate, focusing on decentralized cross-chain token swap, exchange, and market. Darwinia also serves as critical infrastructure for single-chain application upgrades to cross-chain versions, including Defi, Game, DEX, NFT market, etc. Our vision is to build the future Internet of Tokens.
brand.note_1: When using Darwin’s official design documents, please pay attention to the application scenarios:
brand.note_2: 1. Use trendy gradation of the purple logo on white/light background;
brand.note_3: 2. Use the white logo on a dark background;
brand.note_4: 3. Use grey or other color logos if the standard logo is not adept at single color application scene.
brand.note_5: Thank you for your support to Darwinia Network, we hope for pleasant cooperation between us.

ambassador.title: Join the Darwinia Ambassador Program
ambassador.author: By: Darwinia Ambassador Team
ambassador.about_desc: Darwinia Network is a decentralized heterogeneous cross-chain bridge protocol developed using Substrate, focusing on decentralized cross-chain token swap, exchange, and market.  Darwinia also serves as critical infrastructure for single-chain application upgrades to cross-chain versions, including Defi, Game, NFT market, etc. Our vision is to build the future Internet of Tokens.
ambassador.why_desc_1: The mission of Darwinia Network Ambassador Program is to enable those who are passionate about blockchain technology, familiar with Darwinia Network, and active in Web3 Community to collaborate with Darwinia to grow the global community.
ambassador.why_desc_2: We hope to hear about more from the community in different roles, no matter it's fighting for a bunch of codes, crazy for an innovative idea, or just needs help from us, we will treat it sincerely and gratefully;
ambassador.why_desc_3: Don’t hesitate to join us and help to make our voice heard across the various communities.
ambassador.who_desc_1: Anyone can participate in the Ambassador Program;
ambassador.who_desc_2: Anyone can choose to do what they like and make a contribution to the community;
ambassador.who_desc_3: Anyone who contributes will accept the reward and the applause from the Darwinia community!
ambassador.who_desc_4: We encourage any creative behavior and encourage everyone to achieve their growth in the process of creation.
ambassador.who_desc_5: Join the Darwinia Ambassador Program, and make the cross-chain evolution happen.
ambassador.what_desc_1: To make it easier for everyone to participate in the Ambassador Program, we have developed two growth paths for you to choose.
ambassador.tech_desc_1: Two programs have been set up in the technology pathway:
ambassador.link: Please check out the detail here
ambassador.grant_desc: Darwinia Grant will focus on funding the development of the Darwinia ecosystem, such as the development of the Darwinia Network, the development and maintenance of the Darwinia Appchain, and related theoretical research.
ambassador.bounty_desc: We will rate the issues in Darwinia and invite community developers to help with the fix. Community developers can get rewards after fixing the problem and being reviewed. The rewards for fixing different levels of issue will be different.
ambassador.tech_desc_2: Please join the devs group for more latest details: http://t.me/DarwiniaDev
ambassador.edu_desc_1: There are five roles in the community education pathway:
ambassador.content_desc: Educate the community and the broader public about Darwinia through writing informative and insightful content in videos, blogs, graphic designs, podcasts, or any other artistic production form.
ambassador.meetup_desc: Host online or offline Darwinia meetups/ technical workshops/hackathon, connect with local blockchain enthusiasts to educate them on what Darwina is and discover the potential users/partners through discussion and communication.
ambassador.translator_desc: Translate and share Darwinia-related content in different languages and expand Darwinia's ecological application to non-English speaking communities.
ambassador.moderator_desc: Keep Darwinia official social media channels (i.e., telegram, twitter, medium,etc.) informative, productive, and create a pleasant, sustained, and viable environment for community members in multiple languages across various platforms.
ambassador.experience_desc_1: Experience Darwinia Ecological Applications and submit detailed reports according to our requirements. Up to now, Darwinia tech team has created various products on the way leading to Web3.0. For instance:
ambassador.experience_desc_2: Evolution Land: A cross-chain blockchain game to showcase blockchain capabilities and onboard new users.
ambassador.experience_desc_3: Subscan: A high precision data explorer and visualization for substrate-based blockchains.
ambassador.how_title: How to become a Darwinia Ambassador?
ambassador.how_desc_1: To become a Darwinia Ambassador and kickstart a decentralized revolution,
ambassador.how_desc_2: Please apply for an application here.
ambassador.how_desc_3: The whole process should be displayed as below:
ambassador.benefit_content: Make our voices heard! We can provide you with the following benefits:
ambassador.benefit_desc_1: 1. Earn a bunch of Ring token rewards.
ambassador.benefit_desc_2: 2. Receive direct ongoing training and support from Darwinia technical team.
ambassador.benefit_desc_3: 3. Connect with other ambassadors over social media to help spread the world about Darwinia.
ambassador.benefit_desc_4: 4. Attend major crypto industry events and conferences with the team.
ambassador.benefit_desc_5: 5. Accept the reward and the applause from the Darwinia community!
ambassador.benefit_desc_6: 6. Swag: T-shirt, Certification, NFT, Stickers, KUDOs.
ambassador.more_subtitle: Darwinia Network is the first game chain of the Polkadot.

media.recom_4_desc: Darwinia serves as critical infrastructure for single-chain application upgrades to cross-chain versions, including Defi, Game, DEX, NFT market, etc. Our vision is to build the future Internet of Tokens.
media.recom_5_desc: The Darwinia mainnet is planned to launch between September 25 and October 15. Darwinia mainnet launch process will be a progressive process, divided into several stages to unlock main functional modules.

tech.theme_desc: Decentralized Heterogeneous Cross-chain Protocol & Application Chain Development Framework
tech.architecture_desc: Darwinia ChainRelay is a super light-client ChainRelay. It allows us to upgrade the single-chain application protocols to cross-chain versions, which include but not limited to Defi, Game, DEX, NFT Market, etc.
tech.mainnet_stage_desc: The Darwinia mainnet is planned to launch between September 25 and October 15. The Darwinia mainnet launch will be a progressive process, divided into several stages to unlock main functional modules.
tech.relay_desc: Darwinia Bridge takes Chain Relay approach because it's trust-based. With innovations like Merkle Mountain Range and Optimistic Verification Game, we get a sub-linear relay which means we don't need to have each and every block of foreign chains relayed, and even we can achieve "Relay on Demand".
tech.truth_1: A Super Light-client Protocol Chain Header Commitment MMR (Merkle Mountain Range) Optimistic Verification Game Relayer (Prover vs Verifier) Economic Feasibility Sub-linear Relay Relay on Demand
tech.mmr_desc: Merkle Mountain Range Block Header Digest. This MMR root is the root of previous block header hashes. Our chain relay first verifies if the block is within the longest chain. If yes, we can trust the info in this block and use its transaction Merkle root to verify the submitted transaction.
tech.game_desc: Probabilistic sampling will greatly increase the difficulty and decrease the probability that an attack can forge a series of blocks without being detected and therefore punished.

model.staking_desc: The Darwinia Network will distribute RING as an incentive to the participants of Staking. The process of Staking can also be understood as the POS mining process, where the miner obtains Staking energy by pledging tokens for POS mining. According to complexity, Staking can be divided into basic and advanced versions.
model.inflation_content: After the Darwinia Network mainnet goes live, the total cap of the block reward is adjusted once a year. The total number of hard-cap for RING is 10 billion. The following figure shows the RING’s inflation model.
model.inflation_desc: Note: The block reward of year N is 1 - (99/100)^sqrt(N) of total remaining issuable
model.circulation_title: Main Sources of Circulating Ring Supply
model.circulation_desc_2: Sold via Evolution Land Game as early-day funding mechanism (Ethereum & Tron)
model.circulation_chart_desc: RING is divided into three kinds of types: ERC20, TRC20 and Darwinia Network native Ring before Genesis Generation
model.revenue_2_item_1: Cross-chain Asset Transfer Service Fee (per TX) as Revenue
model.revenue_2_item_2: Verification Game Slash Tax as Revenue
model.revenue_2_item_3: Revenue Pool is used to buy back RING and burn
